hero.title: Hey, I'm Ruth.
hero.subtitle: I'm a software developer
hero.description: I can help you build a product, feature or website. Look through some of my work and experience! If you like what you see and have a project you need coded, don't hestiate to contact me.

projects.name: MindFit
projects.description: An all-rounded digital platform that offers solutions for mental wellness, personal, professional, and leadership development.

projects.name: Rent for a day
projects.description: A reservation-based application to rent a property/accommodation for a day. This project is both an API built with Ruby on Rails and PostgreSQL, and a React/Redux application.

workExperience.title: Full Stack Developer
workExperience.description: I have designed and developed full-stack web applications with solid databases, functionalities, responsive designs, and best coding practices, following industry standards like version control (GitHub | GitFlow), & TDD (Test Driven Development).

workExperience.title: State Technical Support Coordinator
workExperience.description: Led technical support and maintenance of computer equipment, servers, and technological infrastructure at the state level, ensuring the operational continuity of 8 establishments with over 200 devices.

education.name: Universidad Nacional Experimental de los Llanos Centrales 'Rómulo Gallegos'​
